titleStmt.title: The history of the Bohemian persecution, from the begining of their conversion to Christianity in the year 894. to the year 1632. Ferdinand the 2. of Austria. Reigning. In which the unheard of secrets of policy, consells, arts, and dreadfull judgements are exhibited.
titleStmt.author: Comenius, Johann Amos, 1592-1670.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by B.A. for Iohn Walker at the Star in Popes-Head-Ally [sic],

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
